name: Pranav Teja

experience.title: Vice President, Aerospace Engineering Society
experience.description: Since its founding, the Aerospace Engineering Society under the aegis of the Department of Aerospace Engineering at IIT Kharagpur has made an effort to provide students with opportunities and built a community of aerospace enthusiasts. Our Alum Talks series has helped many students to pursue their careers of interest. We have had speakers such as Pratyush Kumar, the MD of Boeing Defence India, Subir Choudhury, the chairman of ASI consulting group, Anindya Ghoshal, Army Research Laboratory USA etc.
experience.description_html: Since its founding, the Aerospace Engineering Society under the aegis of the Department of Aerospace Engineering at IIT Kharagpur has made an effort to provide students with opportunities and built a community of aerospace enthusiasts. Our Alum Talks series has helped many students to pursue their careers of interest. We have had speakers such as Pratyush Kumar, the MD of Boeing Defence India, Subir Choudhury, the chairman of ASI consulting group, Anindya Ghoshal, Army Research Laboratory USA etc.

experience.title: Imagineer Intern, AI@Scale
experience.description: The Machine Vision and Conversational AI team, AI@Scale: The machine vision team here focuses on cutting-edge computer vision problems that provide significant value to the clientele. I was a part of the retail analytics division, solving a problem on automatic clustering and planogram detection.
